they all say the average black man only live til 25 pac died at 25 how many kids you know dead at 20 five now thats life i know 10 thats crumbling in coffins dead as a doorknob fresh out of high-school and couldnt find no job went straight to the grave its crazy how the grim reaper in love with such tender age i think about it as i gaze upon my ceiling he woke up brushed his teeth then jumped in the shower stared at the mirror after he dried his face with a towel and said this can be the day i might pass away from an altercation my homie got into yesterday or mistaken identity him thinking i was his enemy when i never seen him a day in my life this is life for a young black man with his future and his burner in his hand while youre on your grind keep this in mind we say…
